# hv_vm_sync_tsc(_:)

**Function**

Synchronizes guest timestamp counters (TSC) across all vCPUs.

## Declaration

```swift
func hv_vm_sync_tsc(_ tsc: UInt64) -> hv_return_t
```

## Parameters

- **tsc**: The value of the guest TSC.

## Return Value

[doc://com.apple.hypervisor/documentation/Hypervisor/HV_SUCCESS] if the operation was successful, otherwise an error code specified in [doc://com.apple.hypervisor/documentation/Hypervisor/hv_return_t].
title: hv_vm_sync_tsc(_:)
